message: And they just happen to have a four-song EP as a free download here:  http://www.myfirstearthquake.com/crush/  (although I must say I'm totally addicted to "Cradle the Ladle" right now)
Love the music. Thanks for the find! :)
You guys rock! I'm glad I decided to check up on this topic just now. I'll definitely be interesting in buying your guys' next album. :)
Hey, this is Chad from My First Earthquake. Saw this through a Google Alert — glad to hear you like our stuff!
haha the internet is so awesome sometimes :-P
@chadthornton Thanks! Really good tunes. You guys should talk to Rdio ( http://rdio.com ). I have a feeling you'd get a ton of new listeners.

Let's make it more awesome: 9wlf-xsvw, nspv-edgs, and wqf7-ucrl. Those are download codes for three free copies of our last full-length. First come, first served. Redeem here:     http://myfirstearthquake.bandcamp.com/yum
@chadthornton w00t free music win! Thanks for the code :)
It's coming out next month. Here's a sneak preview (shh): http://www.myfirstearthquake.com/friction/free/
Thanks for all the sneak peeks and freebies. I'll definitely be looking forward to it. :)

@mko good call on Rdio.  @kevinflo hope you enjoy the tunes. LMK which songs you like best.  @erictj We haven't played Cradle the Ladle in quite some time. I love the farfisa organ sound on that song.
@erictj  I'm really happy for you, and Imma let you finish, but "Neon For You" it's the best earthquake song of all time!
Woot, I picked a working code. Thanks for the free music! I did not know your songs but now, I am really curious ....

@chadthornton!  What? Awesome! Thank you!  We've had you on heavy rotation in our latest household playlist.  Any shows coming up soon in SF?  We'd love to stop by to see you all.   Cheers for the download code!
@erictj Planning the release show for the next album (Friction) now. Should be sometime in May. We'll announce it on twitter (@1stquake) and our FB page, if you want to keep in touch.
@chadthornton Awesome, following now and looking forward to it!
